price: 7. Qofkii se doona wax intaas dhaafsiisan, waa kuwaa xad gudbayaasha.
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
